title: Qls Chebyshev LCU
subtitle: Quantum linear solver with LCU of Chebyshev polynomials
description: Implementation of a quantum linear solver using LCU of Chebyshev polynomials, for use as a drop-in in hybrid CFD codes (e.g. qc-cfd). Two block-encodings are implemented: Pauli decomposition and banded diagonals; singular values are computed to set the inversion range.
